title: A Descendant of Frankenstein
description: Dr. Gustaf, Frankenstein's descendant and a legendary scientist himself, seeks to reanimate the dead. He succeeds, and appoints his daughter Rena its educator. She names him Zealaf. However, when the military comes and tries to take Zealaf away to use as a weapon, Rena runs away with him, trying to find some place that they can live in peace.
